connectionCard.headlineMissing: Connect tldw Assistant to your server
connectionCard.descriptionMissing: tldw server is an optional backend that runs on your own machine or server. It powers chat history, Knowledge search, and media processing. You can explore the extension first, then connect your own server when you’re ready.

worldBooksEmpty.demoTitle: Explore World Books in demo mode

worldBooksEmpty.demoExample2: When you connect, you’ll be able to create world books that tldw can use while chatting.
